body:
I've traced this down to 
```
"//conditions:default": [
    "-ldl",
    "-lpthread",
],
```
which is [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/BUILD#L2036).

Is this a bug? 

If I add `//tensorflow:android": []` as an option in the `select`, this goes away.
